name: AP_CLAIM_IF_PX_USED_HAC
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Interface Info - Grouper Px - Used for HAC Processing (I CLM 21874) item.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PX_USED_HAC_PROC
columns.description: Procedure codes that were used during hospital-acquired condition adjusted diagnosis related group processing.

columns.name: PX_USED_HAC_PROC_1
columns.description: The first procedure code that was used during hospital-acquired condition adjusted diagnosis related group processing.
